description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In this addictive mixture of action and strategy, your mission is to defeat the enemy planet.  Gather resources through collecting sequences and command ships to conquer asteroids, to build more ships and launch weapons. Features ten single player levels, four multiplayer maps, awards and more.
